website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Duramo 7 is an entry-level shoe that’s made for those who wants to have affordable yet efficient running gear. Runners generally lauded this model because of its comfortable and appealing design, as well as its durable nature. The cushioning was also appreciated. Clearly, this neutral shoe was able to gain the favor of many, and it became highly recommended.
pros: The Adidas Duramo 7 was able to allow a tester to stay active all day without causing their feet to ache
they felt that it was suitably comfortable
The façade of this running shoe was lauded by many runners because they saw that it was very eye-catching
It was affordable, wrote a lot of users
A runner who has logged over 50 hours using this model noted that stayed sturdy because cracks or tears didn’t appear after that time
There were many reviewers who were happy to report that this shoe didn’t cause any blisters or sores
A tester wrote that the upper unit felt satisfactorily snug and secure
Several runners felt that the sizing schemes used for the Adidas Duramo 7 were the ones that followed their usual preferences
Those who commented on its weight stated that it felt light and unrestricting
cons: This shoe felt a bit narrow for a tester
The colorways and visual options were limited, noted some reviewers
There were complaints about the outsole, which wasn’t able to deliver sure traction on the roads

customer_reviews.title: Small for an 11 so not much use but look great...
customer_reviews.text: I like these but every other adidas I've ever bought have been size 11 and fit perfectly, these are a bit tight. I stupidly went for a run in them so can't send them back. Make sure you try them on. This is the first and last time I will buy footwear online, a shame because they were a good price and I really love the colour and style.
customer_reviews.author: Jammer

customer_reviews.title: Great All Round Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Arrived next day no dramas. Really well built trainers and incredible light weight! Would recommended, especially for the price you can't fault them.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather.
customer_reviews.text: They are only 80% of the weight of my Nikes. Light as a feather and so far they are please to run in.
customer_reviews.author: sxw

customer_reviews.title: Happy!: ) They look nice
customer_reviews.text: Happy! :) They look nice, feel nice & I can't wait to test them on my next run. Arrived within a week, thumbs up, 5 * from me.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy.
customer_reviews.text: This running shoes I brought for my twenty something son. He is over the moon with them and he is a regular runner currently training for a half marathon. Great Buy.

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good quality. Around delighted with the purchase. Really comfortable for walking around as well as short runs

customer_reviews.text: Light as feather as one of the bloke mentioned on the review for this shoes! It's also very comfortable to wear and stylish!

customer_reviews.text: First time ordering footwear from here. Absolutely delighted with these. Perfect fit and very light. Huge relief!

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable. Everything as described
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Everything as described, transported in the original box, with an extra security box outside, fast delivery to Portugal, as announced.

customer_reviews.title: Bouncy
customer_reviews.text: Feel nice and bouncy and I like the colour and look.

customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Look great. Feel like a much more expensive trainer

customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight trainer but it was just too small.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product for the money and also look the part...

customer_reviews.title: A great affordable running shor
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a steal. The only downside might be that the inner sole cannot be removed.

customer_reviews.title: a greate trade

customer_reviews.title: feel great. Comfy for running but only used on treadmill ...
customer_reviews.text: feel great. Comfy for running but only used on treadmill so far.
customer_reviews.author: A happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Generally rake a size 11 but found these to be a little snug so returned to a well known sports stores and ordered these in 11.5 which fitted perfectly. Great for running on he treadmill and feel very light to wear. Fast delivery from the seller as well!

customer_reviews.title: Good price. First running shoes ever bough
customer_reviews.text: Spot on. Good price. First running shoes ever bough. Very happy with product. Fast delivery.

customer_reviews.text: Just not up to Adidas standard as too small and very little support, I returned the shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Omg I got these on such a good offer and they feel so spongey in the sole ...
customer_reviews.text: Omg I got these on such a good offer and they feel so spongey in the sole and sooo comfy 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes- great price. Have ran over 100miles in them now and they're still going strong.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 1 month into it and sole started to came off, never expect this from Adidas brand, returned right away

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of trainers. Fit perfectly, and so comfortable. Definitely worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable running shoes
customer_reviews.text: lightweight comfortable and a good price, ideal for the novice runner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: adidas Duramo 7, Men's Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The full Sandwich open mesh upper structure lets air permeate the interior providing full foot breathability and key ventilation while supporting the mesh fabric's synthetic overlays with a Welded 3-Stripe panel act upon the mesh upper providing full foot stabilisation and reliable support. This also restrains the fabric from unwanted movements and provides a seamless, close to comfort fit. Bringing comfort to the upper a padded tongue with close fit lacing provides a plush, secure feel with parallel performance within the EVA removable sockliner and heel counter which then cushioning the arch and full base of your foot throughout transition. Midsole Propelling you through the gait cycle the full length ADIPRENE midsole technology coincides with the upper to provide a sturdy platform that supplies superior cushioning and support on impact. Reducing pressures forced upon the underfoot anatomically placed flex lines defined into the midsole compound, fold on contact to reduce torsion yet maintain propulsion and efficiency. Outsole Flowing through your run the duramo 7 full length ADIWEARTM outsole offers the ultimate in high-wear durability and floor fighting grip. Deep flex grooves in the outsole help to reduce the overall weight and promote natural movements that keep you moving forward.
